title: Design of E-Learning Media-Based Teaching Methods for Elementary Science Education [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education theory and experience in ICT-integrated instruction
context.additional_context: Enhancing smartphone-based e-learning media production and utilization competencies for pre-service elementary teachers

learning_goals: They can describe the e-learning content development process suitable for elementary science topics.
They can design at least three interactive science learning activities implementable on smart devices.
They can develop formative assessment tools and analyze learning effectiveness when applying e-learning media.
They can evaluate the changing role of teachers in ICT-based science classes through case studies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
